import React, { FC, useState, useCallback } from 'react' import styles from './news.module.css' import avatar from '../../images/png/Bitmap.png' import post from '../../images/jpg/Bitmap.jpg' import path from '../../images/svg/Path.svg' import comment from '../../images/svg/post/comment.svg' import link from '../../images/svg/link.svg' import retweet from '../../images/svg/post/retweet.svg' import like from '../../images/svg/post/like.svg' import share from '../../images/svg/post/share.svg' import statistics from '../../images/svg/post/statistics.svg' // пофиксить counter лайка export const postNavSvg = [comment, retweet, like, share, statistics] export const bookmarks: string[] = [] // придумать как добавлять посты по лайку type props = { postNews: string[] } export const News: FC = React.memo(({ postNews }) => { const [buttonLike, setButtonLike] = useState('') const [buttonFlag, setButtonFlag] = useState(false) const [counterLike, setCounterLike] = useState(0) const onClickHandler = useCallback((e) => { const title = e.target.alt if (title === '2') { setButtonLike(title) setCounterLike(1) setButtonFlag((prev) => !prev) } }, []) return ( <>
